content:
Perfect! Treating yourself to a coffee or smoothie after a ride is a great way to refuel and relax. And trying out a new café is always a fun adventure. You can sit back, enjoy your drink, and reflect on the great ride you just had.

I think you've got a solid plan in place for a fun and relaxing ride. You've got your route, your gear, and your post-ride treat all lined up. All that's left to do is get out there and enjoy the ride!

Have a great time on your ride, and I hope the weather and scenery are perfect for you!
